nodes.text: Bokaan Race Engineering was a vehicle manufacturer around 32 BBY. They were responsible for creating the BRE Block6 Tri-Ram Podracer. The vehicle was noted for above average traction, handling, and cooling. The diminutive Podracer pilot Fud Sang, an inmate on Oovo IV, was presented a Block6 from the prison warden Fenn Booda, which Sang used to race against offworlders.
